testcase.name: Successful Login with Valid Credentials
testcase.system-out: When title of login page is Facebook - Log In or Sign Up....................passed Then user enters "email" and "Pwd"..........................................passed Then user is on home page...................................................passed Then user click on TriangleButton...........................................passed And click on LogOut Button..................................................passed Then user is on the LoginPage...............................................passed

testcase.classname: Fill a simple form with excel data
testcase.name: Data driven with excel and data sets
testcase.system-out: Given user is on Main Page.................................................passed Then user enters Signup Credentials with excel row "1" dataset..............passed

testcase.classname: Fill a simple form with excel data
testcase.name: Data driven with excel and data sets 2
testcase.system-out: Given user is on Main Page.................................................passed Then user enters Signup Credentials with excel row "2" dataset..............passed

testcase.name: Facebook Create a new Account scenario
testcase.system-out: When title of login page is Facebook - Log In or Sign Up....................passed Then user enters Signup credentials.........................................passed Then user is on homepage....................................................passed Then Close the browser......................................................passed

testcase.name: Create a new Account with blank FirstName
testcase.system-out: When user enters inputs without FirstName...................................passed Then verify the FirstName ErrorMessage......................................passed

testcase.name: Create Account with blank EmailId
testcase.system-out: When user enters inputs without BlankEmailId................................passed Then verify the BlankEmailId ErrorMessage...................................passed
